00016 #ifndef __L4UTIL__PRIO_H__
00017 #define __L4UTIL__PRIO_H__
00018 
00019 #include <l4/sys/syscalls.h>
00020 
00021 EXTERN_C_BEGIN
00022 
00028 
00037 static inline int
00038 l4util_prio_thread_set(l4_threadid_t id, unsigned prio)
00039 {
00040   l4_sched_param_t p;
00041   l4_threadid_t dummy = L4_INVALID_ID;
00042 
00043   l4_thread_schedule(id, L4_INVALID_SCHED_PARAM, &dummy, &dummy, &p);
00044 
00045   if (!l4_is_invalid_sched_param(p))
00046     {
00047       p.sp.prio  = prio;
00048       p.sp.state = 0;
00049       l4_thread_schedule(id, p, &dummy, &dummy, &p);
00050       if (!l4_is_invalid_sched_param(p))
00051   return 0;
00052     }
00053 
00054   return 1;
00055 }
00057 EXTERN_C_END
00058 
00059 #endif /* ! __L4UTIL__PRIO_H__ */
